div.p: foo must contain a link element with rel="alternate"
This element must contain a link element with rel="alternate", but it's missing.

Add a link element that points to an alternate representation of this feed or entry. For feeds, this is likely the home page of the associated website; for entries, this is likely the permanent link of the entry.

p.code:
<feed version="0.3" xmlns="http://purl.org/atom/ns#">
<title>dive into mark</title>
<link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://diveintomark.org/"/>
...
